header: ORDER BELOW EXH. 1 IN CRI. MISC. APPLICATION No. 148/2019 (Popat Balu Darade Vs. State of Maharashtra) CNR : MHST01-000796-2019

background.text: 1) Applicant has filed this application for anticipatory bail. It is contended that, the offence is registered against the accused in Shirwal Police Station vide C.R.No. 195/2018 in respect of offence pun/u/s. 380,454 of I.P.C.

arguments.text: 2) It is further contended that, alleged incident took place at about 12­30 p.m. at the house of informant. In said incident as per FIR golden and silver articles worth Rs.66,000/­ were stolen by unknown person by breaking the door of house of informant. During investigation as per the secret information accused Jagdish @ Bala Popat Darade resident of village Akole, Tal­Indapur, Dist­Pune is arrested and it was transpired that, another accused namely Ram Nathuram Ghatela is involved in the crime. After arrest of Jagdish Popat Darade he was remanded to PC on 27­9­2018 till 01­10­2018. I.O. has recovered golden and silver articles in the crime from accused Jagdish Darade thereafter, he was remanded to MCR. Present applicant is not related to Jagdish Darade and to the alleged incident of theft, still concern I.O. is unnecessarily calling the applicant and visiting the house of applicant hence he has apprehension of his arrest. Applicant is working as labour contractor and agriculturist, he is permanent resident of Vanjarwadi, Tal–Baramati, Dist­Pune. It is further stated that, IO is trying to involve the applicant unnecessarily without arresting accused namely Ram Ghatela. He is ready to abide by the conditions, he will co­operate to investigation, he will not tamper with prosecution witnesses.

argumentSentences.text: 2) It is further contended that, alleged incident took place at about 12­30 p.m. at the house of informant.
In said incident as per FIR golden and silver articles worth Rs.66,000/­ were stolen by unknown person by breaking the door of house of informant.

During investigation as per the secret information accused Jagdish @ Bala Popat Darade resident of village Akole, Tal­Indapur, Dist­Pune is arrested and it was transpired that, another accused namely Ram Nathuram Ghatela is involved in the crime.
After arrest of Jagdish Popat Darade he was remanded to PC on 27­9­2018 till 01­10­2018.
I.O. has recovered golden and silver articles in the crime from accused Jagdish Darade thereafter, he was remanded to MCR.

Present applicant is not related to Jagdish Darade and to the alleged incident of theft, still concern I.O. is unnecessarily calling the applicant and visiting the house of applicant hence he has apprehension of his arrest.
Applicant is working as labour contractor and agriculturist, he is permanent resident of Vanjarwadi, Tal–Baramati, Dist­Pune.
It is further stated that, IO is trying to involve the applicant unnecessarily without arresting accused namely Ram Ghatela.
He is ready to abide by the conditions, he will co­operate to investigation, he will not tamper with prosecution witnesses.

arguments.text: 3) Application is opposed by filing say at exh. 5 stating that, the arrested accused has confessed that, along with other accused Ram Nathuram Gathela he has committed offence and showed the jewelry shop where he has kept the ornaments accordingly the ornaments are seized. It is further stated that, there is no information regarding the existence of Ram Ghatela and it reveals that, accused Jagdish in order to save applicant falsely stated name of another accused as Ram Nathuram Gathela.

argumentSentences.text: 3) Application is opposed by filing say at exh. 5 stating that, the arrested accused has confessed that, along with other accused Ram Nathuram Gathela he has committed offence and showed the jewelry shop where he has kept the ornaments accordingly the ornaments are seized.

It is further stated that, there is no information regarding the existence of Ram Ghatela and it reveals that, accused Jagdish in order to save applicant falsely stated name of another accused as Ram Nathuram Gathela.

arguments.text: 4) Heard advocate for applicant Shri. Sanap and Ld. APP.

argumentSentences.text: 4) Heard advocate for applicant Shri.
Sanap and Ld. APP.

arguments.text: 5) It is submitted that name of applicant is not disclosed by the arrested accused. It is submitted that, IO wants to save Ram Nadhuram Gathela who is resident of Baramati and to implicate the applicant.

argumentSentences.text: 5) It is submitted that name of applicant is not disclosed by the arrested accused.
It is submitted that, IO wants to save Ram Nadhuram Gathela who is resident of Baramati and to implicate the applicant.

arguments.text: 6) From the papers it seems that, the stolen property in present crime is seized from accused no. 1 along with the other property. Nothing is to be recovered in present crime. Second accused is to be arrested only on the ground of his involvement in crime. As it is submitted that accused Ram Gathela is very much residing in city Baramati. It is for I.O. to take search and even if IO doesn't feel necessary to arrest said accused applicant herein can not be arrested without any evidence against him. Considering the facts ad­interim protection granted to accused may be confirmed. Hence, following order.

argumentSentences.text: 6) From the papers it seems that, the stolen property in present crime is seized from accused no. 1 along with the other property.
Nothing is to be recovered in present crime.
Second accused is to be arrested only on the ground of his involvement in crime.
As it is submitted that accused Ram Gathela is very much residing in city Baramati.
It is for I.O. to take search and even if IO doesn't feel necessary to arrest said accused applicant herein can not be arrested without any evidence against him.
Considering the facts ad­interim protection granted to accused may be confirmed.
Hence, following order.

order.text: ORDER 1) Criminal Bail Application no. 148/2019, is allowed. 2) Interim pre­arrest bail order dated 28/02/2019 passed below Exh. 4, stands confirmed. 3) Applicant to attend to concerned police station as and when called.

footer: (B.S.Wavre) Place : Satara Addl. Sessions Judge, Date : 20th June, 2019 Satara.
processedText:
ORDER BELOW EXH. 1 IN CRI. MISC. APPLICATION No. 148/2019 (Popat Balu Darade Vs. State of Maharashtra) CNR : MHST01-000796-2019 
---header-ends---
1) Applicant has filed this application for anticipatory bail. It is contended that, the offence is registered against the accused in Shirwal Police Station vide C.R.No. 195/2018 in respect of offence pun/u/s. 380,454 of I.P.C. 
---background-ends---
2) It is further contended that, alleged incident took place at about 12­30 p.m. at the house of informant. In said incident as per FIR golden and silver articles worth Rs.66,000/­ were stolen by unknown person by breaking the door of house of informant. During investigation as per the secret information accused Jagdish @ Bala Popat Darade resident of village Akole, Tal­Indapur, Dist­Pune is arrested and it was transpired that, another accused namely Ram Nathuram Ghatela is involved in the crime. After arrest of Jagdish Popat Darade he was remanded to PC on 27­9­2018 till 01­10­2018. I.O. has recovered golden and silver articles in the crime from accused Jagdish Darade thereafter, he was remanded to MCR. Present applicant is not related to Jagdish Darade and to the alleged incident of theft, still concern I.O. is unnecessarily calling the applicant and visiting the house of applicant hence he has apprehension of his arrest. Applicant is working as labour contractor and agriculturist, he is permanent resident of Vanjarwadi, Tal–Baramati, Dist­Pune. It is further stated that, IO is trying to involve the applicant unnecessarily without arresting accused namely Ram Ghatela. He is ready to abide by the conditions, he will co­operate to investigation, he will not tamper with prosecution witnesses. 
---argument-ends---
3) Application is opposed by filing say at exh. 5 stating that, the arrested accused has confessed that, along with other accused Ram Nathuram Gathela he has committed offence and showed the jewelry shop where he has kept the ornaments accordingly the ornaments are seized. It is further stated that, there is no information regarding the existence of Ram Ghatela and it reveals that, accused Jagdish in order to save applicant falsely stated name of another accused as Ram Nathuram Gathela. 
---argument-ends---
4) Heard advocate for applicant Shri. Sanap and Ld. APP. 
---argument-ends---
5) It is submitted that name of applicant is not disclosed by the arrested accused. It is submitted that, IO wants to save Ram Nadhuram Gathela who is resident of Baramati and to implicate the applicant. 
---argument-ends---
6) From the papers it seems that, the stolen property in present crime is seized from accused no. 1 along with the other property. Nothing is to be recovered in present crime. Second accused is to be arrested only on the ground of his involvement in crime. As it is submitted that accused Ram Gathela is very much residing in city Baramati. It is for I.O. to take search and even if IO doesn't feel necessary to arrest said accused applicant herein can not be arrested without any evidence against him. Considering the facts ad­interim protection granted to accused may be confirmed. Hence, following order. 
---argument-ends---
ORDER 1) Criminal Bail Application no. 148/2019, is allowed. 2) Interim pre­arrest bail order dated 28/02/2019 passed below Exh. 4, stands confirmed. 3) Applicant to attend to concerned police station as and when called. 
---order-ends---
(B.S.Wavre) Place : Satara Addl. Sessions Judge, Date : 20th June, 2019 Satara.
